document.title: Corpus Juridisch Nederlands (Online)
document.intro: The Corpus Juridisch Nederlands comprises a collection of 5,856 legal texts from the period 1814 to 1989, compiled year by year. Initially, this corpus was part of the 38 million-word corpus and later of the Corpus Contemporary Dutch. Displays sentences of text fragments from the corpus.
